pass.name: Unmake
pass.description: Immobilizing enemy champions increases the damage they take by 15% for 5 seconds.

pass.name: Glide
pass.description: Gain {{as|5% bonus movement speed}}.

Anathema's Chains.caption: "She swore to dedicate her life to his destruction. The gauntlets heard."

act.name: Vow
act.description: Designate the target enemy champion as your Nemesis and gain 1 stack of Vendetta every 2 seconds over 60 seconds, up to 30 stacks, resetting upon selecting a new Nemesis. Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in combat with champions and having a Nemesis.

pass.name: Vendetta
pass.description: Take 1% reduced damage per stack of Vendetta from your Nemesis, up to 30% reduced damage.

pass2.name: Vengeance
pass2.description: At maximum stacks, your Nemesis has 20% reduced tenacity while they are within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 700 units of you.

pass.name: Awe
pass.description: Grants ability power equal to {{as|3% bonus mana}}.

pass2.name: Mana Charge
pass2.description: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants {{as|3 bonus mana}}, increased to {{as|6|mana}} if it's a champion, up to maximum of {{as|360 bonus mana}}.

pass3.description: Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at {{as|+360 mana}}.

pass.name: Sanctify
pass.description: Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) enhances you and them with {{as|{{pp|type=target's level|key=%|10 to 30}} bonus attack speed}} and {{as|{{pp|type=target's level|5 to 20}} bonus magic damage|magic damage}} on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.

pass.name: Immolate
pass.description: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|12 {{as|(+ 1% bonus health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 325 (+100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and monsters.

pass.name: Annul
pass.description: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next hostile ability.

pass.name: Carve
pass.description: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack reduces the target's {{as|armor by 5%}}, up to {{as|30%|armor}} at 6 stacks.

pass2.name: Rage
pass2.description: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to an enemy champion grants {{as|3 bonus movement speed}} per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to {{as|18|ms}}.

act.name: Warding
act.description: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

pass.description: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

pass.name: Mist's Edge
pass.description: Basic attacks deal {{as|{{rd|10%|6%}} of the target's current health}} {{as|bonus physical damage}} on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

pass2.name: Siphon
pass2.description: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes all stacks to deal {{as|{{pp|40 to 150}} bonus magic damage}} on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you {{as|25% bonus movement speed}} for the same duration.

pass.name: Blood Barrier
pass.description: Convert the healing received from {{sti|life steal}} in excess of {{as|100% maximum health}} into a shield for up to {{pp|50 to 350}}, which slowly decays after not dealing or taking damage for 25 seconds.

Bloodward.caption: {{sbc|:}} All stats except Critical Strike Chance have been improved.

pass.name: Lifeline
pass.description: If you would take damage that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your maximum health}}, you first gain a shield that absorbs {{pp|300 to 800|1;10 to 18 by 1}} damage for 3 seconds and {{as|{{pp|15 to 35|1;10 to 18 by 1}} bonus attack damage}} for 8 seconds.

pass.name: Thorns
pass.description: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal {{as|3 magic damage}} to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

act.name: Warding
act.description: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

pass.description: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

act.name: Thirsting Slash
act.description: Deal {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius around you. Heal for {{as|25% AD}} {{as|(+ 10% of your missing health)}} for each enemy champion hit.

pass.name: Spite
pass.description: Gain {{pp|type=missing health|color=health|key=%|0 to 15 for 11|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=1% per 5% missing health}} of your {{as|AD}} as {{as|bonus AD}}.

pass.name: Hackshorn
pass.description: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds, increased to 60% if the target is left with less than {{as|50% of their maximum health}}.

pass.name: Puffcap Toxin
pass.description: Dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

pass.name: Spelldance
pass.description: If you have at least {{as|160 ability power}}, gain {{as|20 ability haste}} and {{as|20 bonus movement speed}}.

pass.name: Reap
pass.description: Killing a minion grants {{g|+1}}, up to a maximum of {{g|+100}}.
pass.description2: After having killed 100 minions, grants an additional {{g|+350}} and permanently disables this passive.

pass.name: Glory
pass.description: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Lose 5 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer.

pass2.name: Dread
pass2.description: Gain {{as|4 ability power}} for each stack of Glory.

Dead Man's Plate.caption: "There's only one way you'll get this armor from me..." - forgotten namesake
Dead Man's Plate.limit: Ranged champions do not apply the slow.

pass.name: Shipwrecker
pass.description: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum each 0.25 seconds, granting up to {{as|40 bonus movement speed}} at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks on-hit to deal {{pp|0 to 40 for 11|0 to 100|type=Momentum|label1=stacks of Momentum|formula=1 for every 1 stack of Momentum, capped at 40}} {{as|(+ {{pp|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 100|key=%|type=Momentum|label1=stacks of Momentum|formula=1% for every 1 stack of Momentum, capped at 100}} base AD)}} {{as|bonus physical damage}}. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.

pass.name: Ignore Pain
pass.description: Stores {{rd|35%|15%}} of all {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} {{as|physical damage}} received, which is successively taken as {{as|true damage}} over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

pass2.name: Defy
pass2.description: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for {{as|15% of your maximum health}} over 2 seconds.

pass.name: Spellblade
pass.description: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{rd|{{as|12%|health}}|{{as|9%|health}}}} {{as|of target's maximum health}} as {{as|bonus physical damage}} on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to {{as|150% base AD}} and a maximum damage against monsters equal to {{as|250% base AD}}. If the target is a champion, heal for {{rd|{{as|7.8%|health}}|{{as|3.6%|health}}}} {{as|of the target's maximum health}}, with a minimum heal equal to {{rd|{{as|97.5%|AD}}|{{as|60%|AD}}}} {{as|base AD}}.

pass.name: Azakana Gaze
pass.description: Dealing ability damage curses enemies, causing them to take{{ft|{{as|4.8% of their maximum health}} as {{as|total magic damage}} over 4 seconds.|{{as|1.2% of their maximum health}} as {{as|magic damage}} every second over 4 seconds.}}Gain {{as|10 bonus armor}} and {{as|10 bonus magic resistance}} while enemies are afflicted, both increased by 2.5 for each additional champion affected.

pass.name: Spellblade
pass.description: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{rd|{{as|12%|health}}|{{as|9%|health}}}} {{as|of target's maximum health}} as {{as|bonus physical damage}} on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to {{as|150% base AD}} and a maximum damage against monsters equal to {{as|250% base AD}}. If the target is a champion, heal for {{rd|{{as|7.8%|health}}|{{as|3.6%|health}}}} {{as|of the target's maximum health}}, with a minimum heal equal to {{rd|{{as|97.5%|AD}}|{{as|60%|AD}}}} {{as|base AD}}.

pass.name: Warmonger
pass.description: +2.5% omnivamp

pass.name: Focus
pass.description: Basic attacks deal {{as|5 bonus physical damage}} on-hit against minions.

pass2.name: Drain
pass2.description: Killing a unit restores {{as|6 mana}}, if you can't gain mana, restore 3 health instead.

pass.name: Focus
pass.description: Basic attacks deal {{as|5 bonus physical damage}} on-hit against minions.

pass2.name: Endure
pass2.description: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to {{pp|0 to 40 for 11|type=current missing health|color=health|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=0.53 health regen for 1% missing health}} health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness on ranged champions or when triggered by AoE, DoT or proc effects.

Draktharr's Shadowcarver.limit: Ranged champions do not apply the slow.
Draktharr's Shadowcarver.caption: {{sbc|:}} All stats have been improved.

pass.name: Nightstalker
pass.description: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals {{as|65 {{as|(+ 25% bonus AD)}} bonus physical damage|physical damage}} on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds.
pass.description2: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets this effect's cooldown and grants you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.

act.name: Halting Slash
act.description: Deal {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius centered around you and slow them by 40% for 3 seconds. Can be cast while moving.

pass.name: Heroic Gait
pass.description: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} grants you {{as|20 bonus movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

pass.description: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals {{as|65 {{as|(+ 25% bonus AD)}} bonus physical damage|physical damage}} on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds.
pass.description2: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets this effect's cooldown and grants you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.

pass.name: Ever Rising Moon
pass.description: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them {{as|6% of target's maximum health}} as {{as|bonus physical damage}} and grants you {{as|15% bonus movement speed}} and a shield for {{rd|180|90}} {{as|(+ {{rd|40%|20%}} bonus AD)}} for 2 seconds.

pass.name: Annul
pass.description: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next hostile ability.

Emberknife.req: Can only be purchased if you have {{si|Smite}}.

pass.name: Sear
pass.description: Damaging monsters burns them for {{as|60 {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% bonus AD)}} {{as|(+ 2% bonus health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

pass2.name: Challenging Path
pass2.description: Using {{si|Smite}} 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into {{si|Challenging Smite}}, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.

pass3.name: Huntsman
pass3.description: Killing large monsters grants {{as|60 bonus experience}}. The first large monster killed grants an additional {{as|150 bonus experience}}, for a total of {{as|210|experience}}. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant {{as|50 bonus experience}} per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.

pass4.name: Recoup
pass4.description: Regenerate up to {{as|{{pp|8 to 18}} mana}} per second when in the jungle or river, based on {{as|missing mana}}.

pass.name: Spellblade
pass.description: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|100% base AD (+ 40% bonus AD)}} {{as|bonus physical damage}} on-hit and restores {{as|mana}} equal to {{as|40% base AD (+ 16% bonus AD)}}.

act.name: Glaciate
act.description: After 0.3 seconds, unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, which deal {{as|100 {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}} to all enemies within their path and slows them by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead.

act.name: Glaciate
act.description: After 0.3 seconds, unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, which deal {{as|100 {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}} to all enemies within their path and slows them by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead.

pass.name: Rend
pass.description: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

pass.name: Echo
pass.description: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals {{as|100 {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} additional magic damage|magic damage}} to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 600 units around them, impacting after {{rutngt|0.5}} to deal the same damage to each, and grants you {{as|15% bonus movement speed}} for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast.

pass.name: Absorb
pass.description: Taking ability damage grants you {{as|8 bonus movement speed}} and {{as|4 bonus magic resistance}} for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of {{as|40 bonus movement speed}} and {{as|20 bonus magic resistance}}. Each unique ability gives 1 stack.

pass.description: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|{{pp|12 to 30}} {{as|(+ 1% bonus health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 325 (+100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 12%, stacking up to 6 times for a 72% increase.

pass2.name: Flametouch
pass2.description: At maximum stacks, your basic attacks explode around you, burning nearby enemies for your current Immolate damage for 3 seconds.

pass2.name: Snowbind
pass2.description: Basic attacks create a 250 unit radius frost field that slows enemies within by {{rd|25%|12.5%}} {{as|(+ {{rd|4%|2%}} per 1000 maximum health)}} for 1.5 seconds.

aura.name: Winter's Caress
aura.description: Cripples the attack speed of nearby enemies by 20%.

pass.name: Rock Solid
pass.description: Every incoming instance of {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} basic damage is reduced by 7 {{as|(+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health)}}, maximum 40% reduction each.

act.name: Cloudburst
act.description: Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the {{tt|most wounded|Lowest health percent}} enemy within {{tt|750|Estimated, range type and precise value to be confirmed}} radius of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals {{as|{{pp|180/3 to 315/3|1;10 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ 15% bonus AD)}} magic damage|magic damage}}, for a total of {{as|{{pp|180 to 315|1;10 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ 45% bonus AD)}}|magic damage}}, increased by {{pp|type= target's missing health|color=health|key=%|0 to 50|key1=%|0;7;14;21;28;35;42;49;56;63;70|formula=5% per 7% of enemies' missing health}}.

act.name: Monolith
act.description: Gain a shield for 100 {{as|(+ 100% bonus health)}}, decaying over 2.5 seconds, and +25% increased size while active.

pass.description: Increase your {{as|bonus armor}} and {{as|bonus magic resistance}} by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

pass.description: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for {{as|50% of base health}} and restore {{as|30% of maximum mana}}.

pass.name: Wrath
pass.description: Convert every {{as|1% critical strike chance}} into {{as|2 bonus physical damage}} on-hit, capped at {{as|100% critical strike chance}}, for a maximum of {{as|200 bonus physical damage}} on-hit. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.

act.description2: Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

pass.name: Hypershot
pass.description: Dealing ability damage to a champion with an ability that is neither unit-targeted nor auto-targeted at more than {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 700 units away or immobilizing or polymorphing one reveals them and increases your damage dealt to them by 10% for 6 seconds.

pass.name: Lifeline
pass.description: If you would take {{as|magic damage}} that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your maximum health}}, you first gain a shield that absorbs {{as|200|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% maximum health)}} {{as|magic damage}} for 5 seconds.

pass.name: Glory
pass.description: Gain 4 stacks for each champion kill and 2 stacks for each assist, up to a maximum of 25 stacks. Lose 10 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved from Dark Seal.

pass2.name: Dread
pass2.description: Gain {{as|5 ability power}} for each stack of Glory and {{as|10% bonus movement speed}} if you have at least 10 stacks.

act.name: Quicksilver
act.description: Removes all crowd control debuffs (except Airborne) from your champion and grants {{as|+50% movement speed}} and ghosting for 1 second.

act.name: Purify
act.description: Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Airborne, Blind, Disarm, Ground, Nearsight, and Suppression) from yourself or an allied champion and heal the target for {{pp|100 to 200|type=target's level}}.

pass.description: Reduces {{as|movement speed}} by {{as|90}} for 5 seconds while you are in in-combat. This duration can refresh while staying in-combat.

pass.name: Starlit Grace
pass.description: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most {{as|missing health}} for 70.
pass.description2: Each second spent in combat with champions grants 7% heal and shield power, stacking up to 5 times for maximum of 35%.

effects.mythic: 10 heal for this item's passive effect, Starlit Grace

pass.name: Affliction
pass.description: Dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds, increased to 60% if the target is left with less than {{as|50% of their maximum health}}.

pass.name: Sepsis
pass.description: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Basic attacking a champion 3 times while they remain affected by Grievous Wounds increases their effect to 60%, and dealing {{as|physical damage}} to a target affected by 60% Grievous Wounds will refresh the empowered effect.

pass.name: Awe
pass.description: Grants {{as|bonus attack damage}} equal to {{as|2.5% maximum mana}}.

pass2.name: Shock
pass2.description: Basic attacks on-hit against champions deal {{as|{{as|1.5% maximum mana}} bonus physical damage}}. Dealing ability damage to champions with abilities deals {{as|{{as|{{rd|3.5%|2.7%}} maximum mana}} {{as|(+ 6% AD)}} bonus physical damage|physical damage}}. Can only be triggered on the same target once every 6.5 seconds from the same attack or cast.

pass.name: Icathian Bite
pass.description: Basic attacks deal {{as|15 {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} bonus magic damage|magic damage}} on-hit.

pass.name: Deft Strikes
pass.description: Basic attacks on-attack that critically strike reduce your basic abilities' cooldowns by 20% of their remaining cooldowns.

pass.name: Soulrend
pass.description: Damaging an enemy champion deals {{as|125 {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} bonus magic damage|magic damage}} and grants you {{as|25% bonus movement speed}} for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending upon damaging {{tt|new champions|Champions that do not have a cooldown}}.

pass.name: Precision
pass.description: Basic attacks deal {{as|20 bonus physical damage}} on-hit against minions and monsters.

pass.name: Cursed
pass.description: Dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

act.name: Warding
act.description: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

pass.description: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

pass.name: Sturdy
pass.description: After dealing {{as|physical damage}} to an enemy champion, heal for {{as|{{rd|2%|1%}} of maximum health}} over 6 seconds.

pass.name: Spectral Waltz
pass.description: Basic attacks on-attack grant ghosting, {{as|7% bonus movement speed}}, and a stack of Spectral Waltz for 3 seconds, up to 4 stacks. While at 4 stacks, gain {{as|30% bonus attack speed}}.
Reduces incoming damage from all basic attacks by 12% (''excluding turret attacks'').

act.name: Sandswipe
act.description: Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal {{as|65 {{as|(+ 25% bonus AD)}} physical damage|physical damage}} to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds.

act.name: Quicksilver
act.description: Removes all crowd control debuffs (except Airborne) from your champion.

pass.name: Magical Opus
pass.description: Increase your {{as|ability power}} by 35%.

pass.name: Wrath
pass.description: Convert every {{as|1% critical strike chance}} into {{as|1.75 bonus physical damage}} on-hit, capped at {{as|100% critical strike chance}}, for a maximum of {{as|175 bonus physical damage}} on-hit. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.

act.name: Humility
act.description: Unleash a shockwave around you that slows nearby enemies by 99% for 0.25 seconds and reduces their {{as|attack damage by 10%}} and {{as|critical strike damage by 20%}} for 4 seconds.

pass.name: Rock Solid
pass.description: Every incoming instance of {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} basic damage is reduced by 5 {{as|(+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health)}}, maximum 40% reduction each.

pass.name: Energized
pass.description: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.

pass2.name: Sharpshooter
pass2.description: When fully Energized, your next basic attack deals {{as|120 bonus magic damage}} on-hit. Energized attacks gain 35% bonus range (+150 range maximum).

pass.name: Cleave
pass.description: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal {{as|{{pp|type=distance|changedisplay=true|key=%|60 to 12 for 5|0 to 350}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies near the target. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.

pass.name: Steeltipped
pass.description: Basic attacks deal {{as|15 bonus physical damage}} on-hit.

act.name: Intervention
act.description: You reveal the target area for {{tt|3 seconds|estimated}}. After a 2.5 second delay, a beam of light strikes the ground. Allies within the area are healed for {{pp|200 to 400|type=target's level}}, while enemy champions take {{as|10% of target's maximum health}} as {{as|true damage}}. Can be used while dead.

pass.name: Spoils of War
pass.description: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions {{as|below {{rd|50%|30%}} of their maximum health}}. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill {{g|gold}}. These effects require an allied champion to be {{tt|nearby|1050 range}}. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

Sorcerer's Shoes.caption: "For nearly a century, the greatest mage in Valoran resided in the scorched desert of the Zear realm until the first crusade of the Rune Wars devastated the entire region forcing millions to flee. The crusaders killed all desperate travelers attempting the mass exodus from Zear, but one mage escaped their grasp by making such haste across the land that word spread throughout Valoran that the very shoes this mage wore must be imbued with immense power."
